div.p: Indicates whether this flag is active and needs to be displayed to a user, or whether it is no longer needed or entered in error.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/flag-status defines the following codes:

tr.td: A current flag that should be displayed to a user. A system may use the category to determine which roles should view the flag.
The flag does not need to be displayed any more.
The flag was added in error, and should no longer be displayed.

description.value: Indicates whether this flag is active and needs to be displayed to a user, or whether it is no longer needed or entered in error.

definition.value: A current flag that should be displayed to a user. A system may use the category to determine which roles should view the flag.
The flag does not need to be displayed any more.
The flag was added in error, and should no longer be displayed.
